data.comment: The match is underway in Suita.
Anderson Lopes of Sapporo gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 1, Ryuji Sato awards Gamba a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Suita.
Throw-in for Gamba in the half of Sapporo.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Sapporo in their own half.
Free kick for Sapporo in their own half.
Free kick Gamba.
In the minute 4, Sapporo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sapporo's Anderson Lopes breaks free at Panasonic Stadium Suita. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Gamba at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
In the minute 5, At Panasonic Stadium Suita, Gamba are penalized for being offside.
Sapporo have been awarded a corner by Ryuji Sato.
Sapporo push upfield but Ryuji Sato quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 8, Gamba's Shu Kurata gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Sapporo goal kick.
Douglas scores to make it 0-1 at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
In the minute 9, Yoshiaki Komai with an assist there.
Gamba needs to be cautious. Sapporo have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to Sapporo.
In the minute 13, Sapporo drives forward and Anderson Lopes gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Ball safe as Gamba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Gamba.
In the minute 15, Gamba have been awarded a corner by Ryuji Sato.
Ryuji Sato signals a throw-in for Gamba, close to Sapporo's area.
Yosuke Ideguchi gets an equalizer for Gamba. The score is now 1-1.
In the minute 16, Great play from Kazuma Watanabe to set up the goal.
Ryuji Sato awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Sapporo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Gamba's half?
In the minute 19, Sapporo surge into the attack at Panasonic Stadium Suita but Anderson Lopesâ€™s header is off-target.
Gamba have a goal kick.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Sapporo in their own half.
In the minute 20, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Sapporo have been awarded a corner by Ryuji Sato.
Ryuji Sato awards Gamba a goal kick.
In the minute 23, Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Sapporo in their own half.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Sapporo.
Free kick for Gamba in their own half.
In the minute 25, Ryuji Sato signals a Gamba throw-in in Sapporo's half.
Gamba to take a throw-in in Sapporo territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Sapporo goal kick.
In the minute 28, Throw-in Gamba.
Can Sapporo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gamba's half?
Ryuji Sato signals a Sapporo throw-in in Gamba's half.
In the minute 31, Gamba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sapporo push upfield and Yoshiaki Komai gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Gamba defence.
Sapporo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 36, Can Gamba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sapporo's half?
Ryuji Sato blows against Sapporo's Douglas for offside.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Sapporo in their own half.
In the minute 37, Gamba's Kosuke Onose has been booked in Suita.
Gamba are pushing forward but Takashi Usami's finish is wide of the goal.
Sapporo have a goal kick.
In the minute 41, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Sapporo at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Free kick for Sapporo in the half of Gamba.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in Sapporo.
Throw-in for Gamba in the half of Sapporo.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the away team in Suita.
Kazuma Watanabe of Gamba smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Gamba drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
The second-half has started.
Sapporo will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Gamba.
In the minute 46, Lucas Fernandes (Sapporo) has received a yellow card from Ryuji Sato.
In Suita Gamba drive forward through Kim Young-Gwon. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Gamba to take a throw-in in Sapporo territory.
In the minute 48, Goal kick for Sapporo at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Can Gamba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sapporo's half?
In Suita a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 50, Free kick Gamba.
In Suita, Sapporo push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Ryuji Sato signals a Sapporo throw-in in Gamba's half.
In the minute 53, Throw-in for Gamba in their own half.
Free kick for Gamba in their own half.
Throw-in for Gamba at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
In the minute 55, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ryuji Sato awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Sapporo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 57, Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Gamba.
Free kick in a good position for Gamba!
Sapporo make their first substitution with Takuma Arano replacing Yoshiaki Komai.
In the minute 59, Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Gamba just outside Sapporo's area.
Shinya Yajima is replacing Shu Kurata for Gamba at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Tsuneyasu Miyamoto is making the team's third substitution at Panasonic Stadium Suita with Shuhei Kawasaki replacing Kosuke Onose.
In the minute 61, Michael Petrovic (Sapporo) is making a second substitution, with Takuro Kaneko replacing Lucas Fernandes.
The home team have replaced Takashi Usami with Patric. This is the first substitution made today by Tsuneyasu Miyamoto.
Gamba's Patric scores with his head to give his side a 2-1 lead.
In the minute 62, Yuki Yamamoto instrumental with a fine assist.
Sapporo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sapporo to take a throw-in in Gamba territory.
In the minute 64, Kosuke Shirai (Sapporo) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Throw-in for Sapporo in the half of Gamba.
Ryuji Sato awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 66, Gamba have a goal kick.
Sapporo to take a throw-in in Gamba territory.
Gamba drive upfield and Kazuma Watanabe gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Sapporo defender.
In the minute 69, Sapporo's Douglas misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Suita.
The away team replace Tomoki Takamine with Chanathip Songkrasin.
In the minute 71, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Gamba close to the penalty box.
Yuki Yamamoto (Gamba) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Gamba.
In the minute 74, Ball goes out of play for a Sapporo goal kick.
Sapporo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hiroki Miyazawa (Sapporo) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 76, Gamba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Sapporo in the half of Gamba.
Gamba are whistled for offside.
In the minute 80, Throw-in high up the field for Gamba in Suita.
Throw-in for Gamba close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Sapporo in the half of Gamba.
In the minute 83, Throw-in Sapporo.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Gamba in their own half.
In Suita a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 84, At Panasonic Stadium Suita, Shunya Suganuma has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Can Gamba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sapporo's half?
Ryota Hayasaka is replacing Douglas for Sapporo at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
In the minute 86, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Gamba in their own half.
Corner awarded to Sapporo.
In the minute 89, Sapporo are caught offside.
At Panasonic Stadium Suita the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Gamba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ryuji Sato signals a Gamba throw-in in Sapporo's half.
Gamba have a dangerous throw-in.
Goal kick for Sapporo at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Can Sapporo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gamba's half?
Gamba's Masaaki Higashiguchi looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Gamba in their own half.
It's 2-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Masaaki Higashiguchi is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
